title: Results of French and Russian Revolutions

content.prompt: All of the following resulted from the French and Russian Revolutions EXCEPT

choices.label: a loss of power for the established church
the execution of the monarch and family
the rise of a strong autocratic leader

topic.text: 5.8: Reactions to the Industrial Economy from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
